A new BlockHeader to mine on

        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"predicate"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"Key Predicate"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`keys-all`, `keys-any`]"}
          schema={{"title":"Key Predicate","enum":["keys-all","keys-any"],"example":"keys-all","description":"key predicate. For a single key this is usually `keys-all`."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"public-keys"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"Miner Public Key (string)[]"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"array","items":{"title":"Miner Public Key","type":"string","example":"f880a433d6e2a13a32b6169030f56245efdd8c1b8a5027e9ce98a88e886bef27"}}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>

                  Host and port of the client as observed by the remote node

              </div>
            </li><li
              className={"schemaItem"}
            >
              <summary
                style={{}}
              >
                <strong>
                  x-server-timestamp
                </strong><span
                  style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}
                >
                   integer
                </span>
              </summary><div>
                <div
                  style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}
                >
                  Example: 1618597601
                  
                  The time of the clock of the remote node
                  
                  
                </div>
              </div>
            </li><li
              className={"schemaItem"}
            >
              <summary
                style={{}}
              >

                </strong><span

                >
                   string
                </span>
              </summary><div>

                >
                  Example: 2.6
                  
                  The version of the remote chainweb node
                  
                  
                </div>
              </div>
            </li>
          </ul>

          <MimeTabs
            className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}

          >
            <TabItem

            >

              >
                <TabItem
                  label={"Schema"}
                  value={"Schema"}
                >

                    style={{}}
                    className={"openapi-markdown__details response"}
                    data-collapsed={false}

                    >
                      <strong>
                        Schema
                      </strong>
                    </summary><div
                      style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      
                    </div><ul
                      style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      <SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"chainBytes"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"binary"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"title":"4 Chain ID Bytes","description":"The chain selection made by the Node. This is\ninformational. Generally, miner should not care about the\nchain.\n","type":"string","format":"binary"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"targetBytes"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"binary"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"title":"32 PoW Target Bytes","description":"The PoW target for the current block. The PoW hash of a\nvalid block must not be larger than this value.\n\nFor arithmetic comparisons the hash-target and the PoW\nhash are interpreted as unsigned 256 bit integral number\nin little endian encoding.\n","type":"string","format":"binary"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"headerBytes"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"binary"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"title":"286 Work Header Bytes","description":"PoW Work Header Bytes. The last 8 bytes are the nonce. The\ncreation time is encoded in bytes 44-52. Miners must not\nchange or make any assumption about the other bytes.\n\nThe creation time is encoded as little endian twoth\ncomplement integral number that counts SI microseconds\nsince POSIX epoch (leap seconds are ignored). It always\npositive (highest bit is 0). Miners are free but not\nrequired to update the creation time. The value must be\nstrictly larger than the creation time of the parent block\nand must not be in the future.\n","type":"string","format":"binary"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem>
                    </ul>
                  </details>
                </TabItem><TabItem
                  label={"Example (from schema)"}
                  value={"Example (from schema)"}
                >
                  <ResponseSamples
                    responseExample={"{\n  \"chainBytes\": \"string\",\n  \"targetBytes\": \"string\",\n  \"headerBytes\": \"string\"\n}"}
                    language={"json"}
                  >
                    
                  </ResponseSamples>
                </TabItem>
              </SchemaTabs>
            </TabItem>
          </MimeTabs>
        </div>
      </TabItem>
    </ApiTabs>
  </div>
